Package org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LineSearch
    Interface specifying the methods for which all classes implementing line search algorithms should have implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmijoInterpolationLineSearch
    Implements an interpolation based line search algorithm that returns a step size value that satisfies the Armijo condition (also known as the sufficient decrease condition).
    BacktrackingLineSearch
    Implements a simple backtracking line search algorithm.
    ExactLineSearch
    Class implementing an exact line search algorithm.
    IterativeLineSearch
    Abstract class that all iterative line search algorithms should extend.
    LineSearchConditions
    A collection of static methods that check whether a selected step size value satisfies certain conditions for the given optimization problem.
    StrongWolfeInterpolationLineSearch
    Implements an interpolation based line search algorithm that returns a step size value that satisfies the strong Wolfe conditions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StepSizeInitializationMethod
    An enumeration of all possible step size initialization methods, used for computing the initial step size value for iterative line search algorithms, that are currently supported by our implementation.
